articles.description: IIAS says Singhania's proposed remuneration is high for the size and complexity of the business.
articles.content: The Institutional Investor Advisory Services has urged shareholders of Raymond Ltd. to vote against the reappointment of Gautam Hari Singhania on the board ahead of the company's annual general meeti… [+1277 chars]
